text:
1/3

Kevin Hart (L) and Eniko Parrish attend a New York screening of "Kevin Hart: What Now?" on October 12, 2016. The couple shared photos this week from their trip to Mexico after Hart was spotted with an unknown woman. File Photo by John Angelillo/UPI | License Photo

July 25 (UPI) -- Kevin Hart and Eniko Parrish put on a united front this week following cheating rumors. The 38-year-old actor and comedian and Parrish shared photos from their trip to Mexico with friends after Hart was spotted with a mystery woman in Miami Beach. Advertisement

"Great times with great people .... #LiveLoveLaugh #Family #Blessed," Hart captioned a picture Tuesday with Parrish and their pals in front of a private jet.

Parrish, a model who is pregnant with the couple's first child, was all smiles Monday in a photo she shared of herself and Hart cooking s'mores. She and Hart also looked happy as they posed for a picture the day previous.

"There's a first time for everything, making s'mores together was one of them. Creating memories that'll last forever. #thelittlethings HARTS," the mom-to-be wrote.

Cabo Nights 🇲🇽 Advertisement A post shared by eníĸo • нarт 💋 (@enikonhart) on Jul 23, 2017 at 8:03pm PDT

Cheating reports surfaced last week after RadarOnline published photos of Hart in a car with an unknown woman July 3. The actor subsequently told Entertainment Tonight the allegations were "absolutely not true."

"Kevin and Eniko are on vacation now with some close friends. They both thought it was a good time to get away and relax," a source told E! News. "When everything went down last week Kevin explained to Eniko nothing happened and that he would never cheat on her."

"They are working it out and the main priority for the two is to stay strong and have a healthy baby," the insider added. "Breaking up is not in the cards."

Great times with great people .... #LiveLoveLaugh #Family #Blessed Advertisement A post shared by Kevin Hart (@kevinhart4real) on Jul 25, 2017 at 10:45am PDT
title: Kevin Hart, Eniko Parrish vacation together after cheating rumors

meta_data.description: Kevin Hart and pregnant wife Eniko Parrish shared photos from Mexico after the actor was spotted with an unknown woman in Miami Beach.
